msbt.message: I like my clothes to be snug. And by snug, I mean tighter than my own skin.
Dressing well is a form of self-care.That's why I'm trying to get my health insurance to cover this really sharp pleather jumpsuit.
It's what's inside that counts. But why not be stylish and fresh on the outside too?
You know, the trends come and go so fast these days, it's even hard for me to keep up. But confidence always looks good, so stay true to yourself and wear what you want to wear!
So what do you think of the fashion scene here on ?I sense a certain inspiration from the local , no?
Excuse me, butare you a fashion buyer? I ask because I know you're not from around here. Well, if you ever need a model or a designer or an actor or a freelance go-getter, I'm your !
When I heard that got its own tailors, I came running as fast as I could. AndI've pretty much been living here ever since. Ha HA!

Can you believe we've got our own tailors here on , ? When the time is right and I launch my own line of pajamas, I hope I can sell them here. They're made of silk and they smell like â€”designed to give you the sweetest of dreams.

Glad to see you've made your way to the hottest new spot on , . If it were up to me, the island would be filled with towering skyscrapers, all packed with designer retail. Yeah, I guess I can see why it's not up to me
